meta.title: Play Hangman: Animals
meta.description: Play hangman with all words as animal names. Some names are tougher to spell than you'd think.

allGames.copy: Hangman with obsure and common animals names. Think pets, four legs, scales, fur, or wings.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Bible Words
meta.description: Play a Bible themed hangman as a Sunday School friendly chalk board game.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Cartoons
meta.description: Play hangman with words related to cartoons. Popular kids' shows and grown-ups' shows, cartoon characters, and super heros.

allGames.copy: Think cartoons. Anything from Saturday mornings decades ago to modern cartoons and kid show to grown-up shows.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Chemistry
meta.description: A hangman game with all Chemistry words. Word or phrases are all elements, glossary terms, and important laws/principals. Hint: there's lot of -ium words.

allGames.copy: Words might be found on the period table, within a Chemistry textbook, or just within the common vernacular of Chemists.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Christmas
meta.description: Online hangman to get you in the holiday spirit. Merry Christmas!

words: Do You Hear What I Hear
I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus
Santa Claus Is Coming To Town
allGames.copy:
Need a hint? Think of Christmas music, pasttimes, and holiday characters.

Also, a perfect lesson plan for teachers ready to checkout for Christmas break. Pop out your mobile phone and just play hangman with the kids until the bell rings.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Cinco de Mayo
meta.description: Play a Cinco de Mayo themed game of hangman.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Easter
meta.description: A hangman game for Easter. Play hangman with all words related to the holiday.

allGames.copy: Hangman words for the Easter holiday season. Things like the Easter bunny, spring flowers, Easter colors, and candy.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Fall
meta.description: Play hangman with fall seasonal words related to crisp weather, sports, holidays, and all the changes you see around you as autumn brings us from summer to winter.

allGames.copy: The leaves are changing color and falling but the kids are inside playing hangman with all autumn words. All words follow a theme of holidays, traditions, environmental and weather changes during the fall months of each year.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Funny words
meta.description: Play hangman with funny sounding words or words with funny meanings. You might need to lookup the meaning of some.

allGames.copy: Each round uses funny words for hangman. Words sound silly or refer to something sort of funny.

meta.title: Play Hangman: GRE Words
meta.description: Undergrads can play hangman with GRE words to get ready for the test.

allGames.copy: The responsible GRE prep is playing online hangman. Don't both with definitions, just know how to spell the word‚Äîthat's enough.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Geography
meta.description: Play hangman online using geography words: countries, cities, capitals, U.S. states, mountains, lakes‚Ä¶

allGames.copy: All these words relate to geography. There are countries, cities, capitals, U.S. states, mountains, and lakes. Teachers may use this for studing international geography.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Halloween
meta.description: Play a not-so-spooky hangman game online. All words are halloween themed.

allGames.copy: Get kids excited for Halloween with Halloween themed hangman. All words relate to fall, candy, costumes, and all spooky things.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Hard words
meta.description: Play a game of hangman online with some of the hardest words to guess. Other more fun categories, like holidays and popular culture, are also available.

allGames.copy:
These are all some of the hardest to guess hangman words. Most words are obsure, contain unusual letters, or contain repeating letters that make guessing a wrong letter very likely. The length of these words are 4+ letters long. Its too easy to slump guessing with real short words.

If you're interested in the thought behind selecting these words, here are some strategies for picking hangan words and here's a list of hard hangman words to just choose from.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Words for older kids
meta.description: Play hangman with words more challenging kids words. Good for children 10-12.

allGames.copy: Hangman words within middle school level vocabulary. Play and spell more complicated words.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Good Words for Kids
meta.description: Hangman with words that kids age 8 or 9 should be able to spell. Good for Elementary school age children.

allGames.copy: Play a hangman game that will help your elementary school age children practice spelling. All words should be familiar and within common curriculum for kids age 3rd graders, 4th graders, or 5th graders.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Easy Words for Kids
meta.description: Let your young kids play hangman and learn spelling at the same time. Good for kids up to 7 years.

allGames.copy: Hangman can help your kids first learn words, expand their vocabulary, and SPELL! Only words appropriate for kids 5-7 years old.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Math
meta.description: Play hangman with all mathematical themed words: areas of study, shapes, common terms, numbers, functions, etc.

allGames.copy: Hangman with math words: common terms, parts of equations, areas of study, shapes, numbers, etc.

words: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

meta.title: Play Hangman: SAT Words
meta.description: High school students can play hangman with all SAT words.

allGames.copy: The responsible SAT prep is playing online hangman. Don't both with definitions, just know how to spell the word‚Äîthat's enough.

meta.title: Play Hangman: Science
meta.description: Play hangman with scientific words related to any field of Science. Also see games related to each scientific feild.

allGames.copy: Words related to professional fields and classroom sciences. Scientific tools, terms, and other sciency things. More specific science hangman games exist such as: Chemistry

meta.title: Play Hangman: Spanish
meta.description: Play hangman with all Spanish nouns. Familiarize yourself with Spanish spelling and vocabulary. Think of it as studying another language.

allGames.copy:
Every Spanish teacher1 will tell their students that playing hangman with Spanish vocabulary words will help your written ability in the language.

1 No teachers were polled.
